title: CPR: Gunpath- The Weapon Generator
description:
A collection of gun generators for Cyberpunk Red.

The Gunpath Generator utilizing Toggle's Temple DLC available from:
https://rtalsoriangames.com/downloadable-content/

Additional material referenced from the Cyberpunk Edgerunner Mission Kit.
https://rtalsoriangames.com/cyberpunk-edgerunners-mission-kit/


Additionally used icons from 
https://game-icons.net
